name: Beet
description: Extremely sweet, perfectly round beets, 8cm across, have deep red skin and dark red flesh.
sowing_method: Sow in well-worked soil after danger of frost in spring. In frost-free areas, sow in fall. Sow thinly in rows 30cm apart and cover with 1.5cm of fine soil. Firm lightly and keep evenly moist. Seedlings emerge in 14-21 days. Thin to stand about 8cm apart when seedlings are 3cm to 5cm tall.
